credit_line: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
title: Project for a candelabrum
medium: Pen and ink, brush and wash, on paper
description: A plant with three boughs, each carrying a blossom intended as a socket on top.  Atop the case which has acanthus scrolls as handles.  Satyr masks are shown below them.  Framing lines and margins.
name: drawing
